Telemetry & Privacy.Name: Connected User Experiences and Telemetry
Telemetry & Privacy.Description: Collects diagnostic and usage data for Microsoft. Major privacy improvement when disabled.

Telemetry & Privacy.Name: WAP Push Message Routing
Telemetry & Privacy.Description: Routes carrier messages. Safe to disable unless using enterprise MDM management.

Telemetry & Privacy.Name: Windows Insider Service
Telemetry & Privacy.Description: Manages Windows Insider Program enrollment. Safe to disable unless participating in beta testing.

Performance & Storage.Name: SysMain (Superfetch)
Performance & Storage.Description: Preloads frequently used applications. Significant performance improvement on SSDs when disabled. May reduce performance on HDDs.
Performance & Storage.Warning: WARNING: Disabling SysMain may reduce performance on traditional hard drives (HDDs). Only recommended for SSD users.

Performance & Storage.Name: Windows Search
Performance & Storage.Description: Indexes files for search. Major performance boost when disabled but breaks Start menu search functionality.
Performance & Storage.Warning: CRITICAL: Disabling Windows Search will completely break Start menu search functionality and Windows Explorer search. This significantly impacts system usability.

Performance & Storage.Name: Offline Files
Performance & Storage.Description: Synchronizes network files for offline access. Safe to disable for most users.

Network & Media.Name: Windows Media Player Network Sharing
Network & Media.Description: Shares media libraries over network. Security improvement when disabled.

Network & Media.Name: Remote Registry
Network & Media.Description: Allows remote registry access. Major security improvement when disabled.
Network & Media.Warning: WARNING: Disabling Remote Registry may break enterprise management tools and remote administration capabilities in business environments.

Network & Media.Name: Remote Access Auto Connection Manager
Network & Media.Description: Creates connections to remote networks. Enhanced security when disabled.

Network & Media.Name: Fax Service
Network & Media.Description: Sends and receives faxes. Obsolete functionality safe to disable.

System & Interface.Name: Program Compatibility Assistant
System & Interface.Description: Provides compatibility warnings. Reduces background scanning when disabled.

System & Interface.Name: Parental Controls
System & Interface.Description: Monitors parental control settings. Safe to disable if not using family features.

System & Interface.Name: Downloaded Maps Manager
System & Interface.Description: Downloads and updates map data. Improves privacy when disabled.

System & Interface.Name: Print Spooler Extensions and Notifications
System & Interface.Description: Provides printer status notifications. Reduces background activity when disabled.

System & Interface.Name: Retail Demo Service
System & Interface.Description: Provides retail demonstration features. Safe to disable for all users.

System & Interface.Name: Geolocation Service
System & Interface.Description: Provides location services to applications. Major privacy improvement when disabled.
System & Interface.Warning: WARNING: Disabling Geolocation Service will break location-based features in all applications, including Maps, Weather, and many third-party apps.

System & Interface.Name: Touch Keyboard and Handwriting Panel
System & Interface.Description: Provides touch keyboard and handwriting recognition. Safe to disable on non-touch devices.

System & Interface.Name: HomeGroup Provider
System & Interface.Description: Provides HomeGroup networking. Deprecated feature removed in Windows 11.

System & Interface.Name: Microsoft Wallet Service
System & Interface.Description: Manages payment and credential information. Improves privacy when disabled.
